name: Restore the Realm
description:
This game was created for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2 with the theme of 'Rewind'.
The idea of the game is to rebuild your realm after it had been decimated by monsters. I took the theme of Rewind and went with the concept of undoing damage, with buildings being rebuild, people being brought back to life and trees regrowing.

Unfortunately I ran out of time and submitted what I had so far.
You can regrow trees with the water spell, ressurect people and rebuild the wizard tower.

I will finish the rest of the development soon.

Thanks for reading and thanks to Never Rest Studio for the music.
